actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to prohibit senior Presidential campaign staff members from engaging in political activities as agents of foreign principals.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to make it unlawful for a senior presidential campaign staff member to engage in political activities as an agent of a foreign principal during the campaign and for 15 years after inauguration of his or her candidate as President. Sets forth penalties for violation of such provision.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit senior Presidential campaign staff members from engaging in political activities as agents of foreign principals.
